links.name: oct7map
links.shortDescription: A geovisualization depicting the atrocities perpetrated by Hamas on Israeli lands on October 7th
links.description: The October 7th Geo-visualization Project strives to provide a comprehensive representation of the atrocities committed by Hamas on that day. This interactive map serves as a reflection and an educational tool, promoting awareness of the gravity of the horrors.

links.name: Stand4Israel
links.shortDescription: In the emergence of the October 7 massacre, Stand4Israel.net was born out of a passion for sharing the unfiltered reality of the horrific bloodshed and atrocities
links.description: Since the war started, Kaltura (Nasdaq:KLTR) and it's tech partners have founded a project dedicated to fight misinformation and share the true events happened since October 7th. In collaboration with IDF, Israel PM office and over 15 civil organizations that volunteered to support israel, we’ve developed stand4israel.net where all advocacy content is aggregated into one place, secured with highest standards, cataloged with AI and ready to be distributed to the relevant audiences.
